name: In the Trace of Father
description:
A twins story

Interactive road story also

Story is briefly:

As usual, they continue their daily routines like going their job but everything changes with Elliott (one of the twins) who is going to the therapist.  Realizing that things are not what he thinks, Elliott takes a road trip with his twin sister Olivia to find out where his real father is.  And things unfold like that ...

At first you can choose one of the twin.

Note:  Main story is Elliot's story and Olivia's story is connected with one end from Elliot's story. Olivia's story starts 6 months later, in summer...
